root.pub-comments: The author does not explicitly distinguish between stocks, families, subgroups, etc. He only refers to stocks in this tree.

child.pub-comments: Sapir includes the following three groups in brackets (1955: 173), leading one to believe they are more closely related, and possibly belonging to a separate group, than the other two languages in Northern Hokan. However, he does not include a name for this apparent grouping.
